data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Nieuw Lekkerland cruise from Batavia to the Netherlands started at 1849-11-11
Ship: Nieuw Lekkerland, Voyage: Batavia - Nederland, 1st Observer: M.B. Hoffman (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
